text: Buy with AWS
gives customers a new streamlined way
of purchasing AWS Marketplace products from your website.
If you're an AWS Partner
who sells or resells products in AWS Marketplace,
you can now make it easier for website visitors
to discover and purchase your products through AWS.
Add Buy with AWS buttons to your website,
and give customers access
to a simplified procurement experience.
Visitors on your website
can quickly subscribe to free trials
or make purchases using their AWS accounts,
accelerating their path to purchase
with a co-branded, secure, and familiar flow.
Complete an integration with AWS Marketplace
and build new experiences on your website
that let your customers search curated product listings,
filter products,
and request custom pricing.
On top of extending the benefits
of AWS Marketplace procurement to your customers,
you'll also gain access to customer insights
so you can track performance.
You can continue leveraging existing processes
for managing your AWS Marketplace listings, disbursements,
and offers in the same way you always have
without additional effort.
Streamline purchasing for AWS customers on your website,
and start building your Buy with AWS experience today.
